issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Plan generation for queries with lots of disjunct filters spends lots of time compiling.
fields.summary: Hive query planning allocating lots of memory and hitting OOMs
